title: cross-cutting - transactional inconsistency - CC1
description: This incident spans multiple services (customer-service, order-service, product-service). Symptom: inconsistent order state across services, failed compensating transactions, and user-visible errors.
root_cause: transactional inconsistency across services / missing compensation flow
fixes_applied: introduced compensation transaction, added distributed tracing and retries, added end-to-end tests
